title: [~NOOB QUESTION, 3=3%?]
body:
when they say +3 to ATK DM (or AP), on Runes... is that 3%?

cheers

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=umjIAAEb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-21T23:31:13.423+0000)
>
> No, it's 3 motherf*cking attack damage. Use your brain, it's there for a reason.

omg hearvine, use your manners, pls.
i want you to be heartfine

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=umjIAAEb,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-22T02:12:46.293+0000)
>
> I'm sorry but when people are this stupid my manners go out the window. You still love me, right?

yes bae
